name: The Warrior - Top stickman
description:
Bravo spartan warriors！Defend against enemies!
Throw spears to pierce the enemies !

Only need to simply drag and drop your finger for targeting and throwing.

Features:
—Simple controls.
—Realistic physics system.
—Numerous sly enemies.
—Funny sound effects.
—Increasing difficulty of levels.
—Kill more enemies to earn more coins.
—Various weapons and armors for collecting.

Start the game now ! Try to be the top spearman !
